languages.text: The character's first {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} deals an additional +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every cell between the character's current position and the spot where they started their turn. The distance is measured in a direct line, ignoring all terrain, with every second diagonal cell counting as two.
languages.original_text: Первая атака персонажа в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} наносит +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно за каждую клетку расстояния между текущей позицией персонажа и точкой, где он начал свой ход. Расстояние измеряется по прямой без учета элементов ландшафта. На этой воображаемой линии каждая вторая клетка, которая соседствует с предыдущей по диагонали, считается за 2.

traits.locale_text: The character's first melee attack each round deals an additional +2 damage for every cell between the character's current position and the spot where they started their turn. The distance is measured in a direct line ignoring all terrain, with every second diagonal cell counting as two.

The character's first melee attack each round deals an additional +2 damage for every cell between the character's current position and the spot where they started their turn. The distance is measured in a direct line, ignoring all terrain, with every second diagonal cell counting as two.

The character's first {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} deals an additional +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every cell between the character's current position and the spot where they started their turn. The distance is measured in a direct line, ignoring all terrain, with every second diagonal cell counting as two.

The character's first {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} deals an additional +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every cell between the character's current position and the spot where they started their turn. The distance is measured in a direct line, ignoring all terrain, with every second diagonal cell counting as two.

languages.text: El primer {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del personaje en cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} inflige +2 de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional por cada casilla que haya entre la posición actual del personaje y la posición donde ha empezado el turno. La distancia se mide en línea directa, ignorando todo el terreno, contando cada segunda casilla diagonal por dos.
languages.original_text: The character's first {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} deals an additional +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every cell between the character's current position and the spot where they started their turn. The distance is measured in a direct line, ignoring all terrain, with every second diagonal cell counting as two.

traits.locale_text: El primer {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del personaje en cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} inflige +2 de daño adicional por cada casilla que haya entre la posición actual del personaje y la posición donde ha empezado el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. La distancia se mide en línea directa, ignorando todo el terreno, contando cada segunda casilla diagonal por dos.

languages.text: このキャラクターの、毎{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の最初の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}は、現在のキャラクターの位置と{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時にいた場所との間のセル1つにつき{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+2される。この距離は直線で計測され、全ての地形を無視し、対角線上のセルは2つで2個とカウントされる。
languages.original_text: The character's first {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} deals an additional +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every cell between the character's current position and the spot where they started their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The distance is measured in a direct line, ignoring all terrain, with every second diagonal cell counting as two.

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターの、毎{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の最初の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}は、現在のキャラクターの位置と{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時にいた場所との間のセル1つにつきダメージが+2される。この距離は直線で計測され、全ての地形を無視し、対角線上のセルは2つで2個とカウントされる。

languages.text: 该角色每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}的首次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}会造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。角色攻击的位置与{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时的位置每相距1格，此次攻击便会额外造成2点伤害。该距离以直线测量，无视一切地形，斜向格子算作2格。
languages.original_text: The character's first {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} deals an additional +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every cell between the character's current position and the spot where they started their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The distance is measured in a direct line, ignoring all terrain, with every second diagonal cell counting as two.

traits.locale_text: 该角色每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}回合{/g}的首次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}会造成额外伤害。角色攻击的位置与{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时的位置每相距1格，此次攻击便会额外造成2点伤害。该距离以直线测量，无视一切地形，斜向格子算作2格。

languages.text: Der erste {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} des Charakters in jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} verursacht zusätzlich +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} für jedes Feld zwischen der aktuellen Position des Charakters und der Stelle, an der er seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} begonnen hat. Die Distanz wird in direkter Linie gemessen, wobei jegliches Terrain ignoriert wird und jedes zweite diagonale Feld doppelt gewertet wird.
languages.original_text: The character's first {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} deals an additional +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every cell between the character's current position and the spot where they started their turn. The distance is measured in a direct line, ignoring all terrain, with every second diagonal cell counting as two.

traits.locale_text: Der erste {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} des Charakters in jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} verursacht zusätzlich +2 Schaden für jedes Feld zwischen der aktuellen Position des Charakters und der Stelle, an der er seine {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} begonnen hat. Die Distanz wird in direkter Linie gemessen, wobei jegliches Terrain ignoriert wird und jedes zweite diagonale Feld als zwei zählt.

languages.text: La première {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} menée par le personnage lors de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} inflige +2 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires par case séparant la position actuelle du personnage de l'emplacement où il a commencé son tour. La distance est mesurée en ligne directe, sans tenir compte du terrain, une case diagonale sur deux comptant pour deux.
languages.original_text: The character's first {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} deals an additional +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every cell between the character's current position and the spot where they started their turn. The distance is measured in a direct line, ignoring all terrain, with every second diagonal cell counting as two.

traits.locale_text: La première {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} menée par le personnage lors de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} inflige +2 points de dégâts supplémentaires par case séparant la position actuelle du personnage de l'emplacement où il a commencé son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. La distance est mesurée en ligne directe, sans tenir compte du terrain, une case diagonale sur deux comptant pour deux.

Расстояние измеряется по прямой без учета элементов ландшафта. На этой воображаемой линии каждая вторая клетка, которая соседствует с предыдущей по диагонали, считается за 2.
